title: Having some serious ping issues.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I'm currently very very frustrated as this is a problem that has just started happening today and tbh it makes league almost unplayable for me. Normally in game I get about 27 ms but today I have been getting on average 165 ms. I have Verizon Fios 20 down 20 up and I really haven't had a problem with this kind of thing before. The link is to an image of a traceroute i just did. If it helps I also live on the east coast.

replies.body:
Most of the time when I see issues about latency (ping) increases, they're caused by ISP routing changes. If you didn't make any recent changes to your network configuration (switch to WiFi or a new router) then we can take a look at your specific network route to one of our test IP addresses. 

I'd like you to grab a network tool called [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/). After opening the tool, plug in the IP address 104.160.131.1 and start the trace. After it has run for 5 minutes, export the results as text and paste them in a reply here. Don't worry, your real IP address isn't listed in the traceroute, so no problems there.

Let me know if you have any questions about this process.
I don't understand why NA doesn't get a west coast/east coast thing going... EU has it China has like 4 servers... Why doesn't NA get two servers? Doesn't make any sense at all.

Day after day i am losing interest in this game and before i would just say this but now i really am........the only game mode i play is maybe something on featured and Aram and with servers like this its just turns me off. Love how riot says How far they have come after 10 years. I would like to tell them Not much. Maybe start fixing your Core. Sad to see lags as bad as this in 2016. I really cannot name 1 game that i am currently playing where i see this bad of lags. This game slowly going to start dying all the people and friend i have are moving on because of the lack of response by riot of this people want. Its a shame
